subject: Ghost and orb pictures
author: fresh_baked
full_text:
Just looked for the first time at the photo section. Lost my interest. As a moderator can you not screen these pictures better or just allow "the best of...." ?

Orbs that join the family photos might be interesting or orbs that land on your hands...or orbs of different shapes and sizes and colors and smiley faces inside... lights that are not reflections or blurs from movement etc...
